name: Neonicum
summary:
Neonicum- unusual game, in which you can see something that I did not see before. How we achieved this? We mixed genres, which no one mixed up before us. 
This is an unusual combination of space theme, neon roguelike in real time. 
The plot, a large number of items, random generation and a variety of opponents will make you immerse yourself in this fantastic reality! 
It is important for us to finish our game in order to show the players completely new experience.
